thread.section_title: Preps / High School Sports - The Denver Post
thread.title: David Glazer, Student-Athlete of the Week
thread.title_full: David Glazer, Student-Athlete of the Week - The Denver Post

author: The Denver Post
title: David Glazer, Student-Athlete of the Week
text:
David Glazer, Denver East
Height: 5-foot-11.
Weight: 140 pounds.
Age: 16. Born: Jan. 15, 1999, in Denver.
High school sports: Tennis (Class 5A No. 4 doubles champion, along with Will Burton) and basketball (guard).
Grade-point average: 4.7.
Class: Junior.
My family: Parents Wendy and Bruce, sister Shayna.
Planned career: Undecided.
iPhone or other: iPhone.
Twitter handle: None.
Three apps I open every day: Instagram, SnapChat and my alarm.
Favorite website: No favorite.
Computer or TV? Computer.
Energy drink or smoothie? Smoothie.
Pizza or burrito? Pizza.
Best prep sports moment so far: Winning the 5A state championship at No. 4 doubles.
